responseData.title: Prism
responseData.shortDescription: Human identity and sexuality is a spectrum. With Prism, you can understand the complexity of being human.
responseData.uniqueDescription: Human identity and sexuality is a spectrum. With Prism, you can understand the complexity of being human.

episodeList.title: The Real Casanova
episodeList.shortDescription: Giacomo Casanova has long been hailed as a lustful beast who romped his way around Europe bedding as many women as he could. Although this reputation is well-deserved, it doesn't tell the whole story.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Giacomo Casanova has long been hailed as a lustful beast who romped his way around Europe bedding as many women as he could. Although this reputation is well-deserved, it doesn't tell the whole story.

episodeList.title: How We Got Gay
episodeList.shortDescription: How We Got Gay tells the incredible story of how gay men and women went from being the ultimate outsiders to occupying the halls of power, with a profound influence on our cultural, political and social lives.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: How We Got Gay tells the incredible story of how gay men and women went from being the ultimate outsiders to occupying the halls of power, with a profound influence on our cultural, political and social lives.

episodeList.title: Intersexion
episodeList.shortDescription: The first question any new parent asks… “Is it a boy or a girl?” What if it’s neither? In this groundbreaking documentary, intersex individuals reveal the secrets of their unconventional lives.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The first question any new parent asks… “Is it a boy or a girl?” What if it’s neither? In this groundbreaking documentary, intersex individuals reveal the secrets of their unconventional lives.

episodeList.title: My Son the Pornographer
episodeList.shortDescription: Meet Art, a man raised with conservative morals, and his son Kole, a writer and actor in pornography. This is a love story between a father and a son who struggle with their relationship and past in a sometimes painful, mostly hilarious way.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Meet Art, a man raised with conservative morals, and his son Kole, a writer and actor in pornography. This is a love story between a father and a son who struggle with their relationship and past in a sometimes painful, mostly hilarious way.

episodeList.title: All Dolled Up
episodeList.shortDescription: All Dolled Up is a documentary about high end love dolls, and the men and women who own them. Light-hearted but serious, this show goes deeper into the culture than any before.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: All Dolled Up is a documentary about high end love dolls, and the men and women who own them. Light-hearted but serious, this show goes deeper into the culture than any before.

episodeList.title: Sexters
episodeList.shortDescription: Sexting has become a new dating tool, embracing all kinds of men and women. Meet couples who use sexting to spice up their marriages, singles looking for love by sexting random strangers and sexting virgins who give it a go for the first time.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Sexting has become a new dating tool, embracing all kinds of men and women. Meet couples who use sexting to spice up their marriages, singles looking for love by sexting random strangers and sexting virgins who give it a go for the first time.

episodeList.title: Women Addicted to Sex
episodeList.shortDescription: Sex Addiction is a disease that often goes unrecorded. It manifests differently in each person’s life, but there is always the same irresistible urge. In this documentary we’ll see how four women have coped with sex addiction in their own unique ways.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Sex Addiction is a disease that often goes unrecorded. It manifests differently in each person’s life, but there is always the same irresistible urge. In this documentary we’ll see how four women have coped with sex addiction in their own unique ways.

episodeList.title: Ancient Inventions of Sex
episodeList.shortDescription: Sex and Love is a crucial component of human existence, but somebody had to invent the kiss… and the mechanical clock was not invented to tell the time as such, but to keep track of a Chinese emperor's sex life!
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Sex and Love is a crucial component of human existence, but somebody had to invent the kiss… and the mechanical clock was not invented to tell the time as such, but to keep track of a Chinese emperor's sex life!

episodeList.title: Trading Faces
episodeList.shortDescription: Plastic surgery is a booming industry in Asia. But is getting a nose job becoming as casual an affair as getting a facial? With events like “Ms. Artificial Beauty”, what lies ahead for the Asian plastic surgery market—and its patients?
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Plastic surgery is a booming industry in Asia. But is getting a nose job becoming as casual an affair as getting a facial? With events like “Ms. Artificial Beauty”, what lies ahead for the Asian plastic surgery market—and its patients?

episodeList.title: Hidden Genders
episodeList.shortDescription: The world is often thought to be made up of just males and females – or is it? Explore how different cultures and religion perceive individuals who are “neither male nor female”, and how those individuals have assimilated to their places in society.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: The world is often thought to be made up of just males and females – or is it? Explore how different cultures and religion perceive individuals who are “neither male nor female”, and how those individuals have assimilated to their places in society.

seriesList.title: Ladyboys
seriesList.shortDescription: They’re the men that have become women. Beneath the sequins and make-up are the painful journeys they have taken to fulfil their dreams. Go inside the secret world of ladyboys as they perform shows, compete in beauty pageants and search for love.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: They’re the men that have become women. Beneath the sequins and make-up are the painful journeys they have taken to fulfil their dreams. Go inside the secret world of ladyboys as they perform shows, compete in beauty pageants and search for love.

episodeList.title: Living the Dream
episodeList.shortDescription: Scott and his ladyboy fiancé have opened a new joint business venture: Sensations Bar. But this isn’t any old drinking hole – it’s a hub for ladyboys and the men who love them.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Scott and his ladyboy fiancé have opened a new joint business venture: Sensations Bar. But this isn’t any old drinking hole – it’s a hub for ladyboys and the men who love them.

episodeList.title: Going the Distance
episodeList.shortDescription: David’s youngest son Troy is coming to Thailand to meet his father’s new ladyboy girlfriend. Will Troy be able to accept his dad’s new partner?
episodeList.uniqueDescription: David’s youngest son Troy is coming to Thailand to meet his father’s new ladyboy girlfriend. Will Troy be able to accept his dad’s new partner?

episodeList.title: Philippine Beauty Queens
episodeList.shortDescription: Thailand is home to the world-renowned Miss International Queen beauty pageant. This year, three very different ladyboy beauty queens are vying for the crown.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Thailand is home to the world-renowned Miss International Queen beauty pageant. This year, three very different ladyboy beauty queens are vying for the crown.

seriesList.title: Changing Sexes
seriesList.shortDescription: Transsexuals struggle to define themselves in the most fundamental way. Is this a psychological disorder, or a biological anomaly? Find out how it feels to be trapped in the wrong body.
seriesList.uniqueDescription: Transsexuals struggle to define themselves in the most fundamental way. Is this a psychological disorder, or a biological anomaly? Find out how it feels to be trapped in the wrong body.

episodeList.title: Changing Sexes: Male To Female
episodeList.shortDescription: Transsexuals struggle to define themselves in the most fundamental way. Is this a psychological disorder, or a biological anomaly? Find out how it feels to be trapped in the wrong body, and discover what pushes men to transform themselves into women.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: Transsexuals struggle to define themselves in the most fundamental way. Is this a psychological disorder, or a biological anomaly? Find out how it feels to be trapped in the wrong body, and discover what pushes men to transform themselves into women.

episodeList.title: Changing Sexes: Female To Male
episodeList.shortDescription: It is one of the most provocative personal statements a person can make: I was born the wrong sex. To express this dilemma, and the desire to resolve it, is to be transsexual. Meet four transsexual women, and share their journey to live as men.
episodeList.uniqueDescription: It is one of the most provocative personal statements a person can make: I was born the wrong sex. To express this dilemma, and the desire to resolve it, is to be transsexual. Meet four transsexual women, and share their journey to live as men.
